author: sebor
msg: 2006-08-28  Martin Sebor  <sebor@roguewave.com>
* codecvt_out.cpp (get_mb_char): Randomized all bits of a wide
character. Used the RW_ASSERT() testsuite macro instead of the
library-configured _RWSTD_ASSERT().
(test_out): Verified that the tested function doesn't write
past the end of the converted destination sequence (denoted
by to_next).
(test_wcodecvt, test_wcodecvt_byname_table_based): Added test
cases, comments. Adjusted indentation.

author: sebor
msg: 2006-08-28  Martin Sebor  <sebor@roguewave.com>
STDCXX-280
* wcodecvt.cpp (__rw_libc_do_out): Used wcrtomb instead of wcsrtombs
in order to avoid reading past the end of the source sequence when
it doesn't contain an embedded NUL.

author: niklas
msg: Fixed an error in the scm URLs (mime4k instead of mime4j).
Changed the version to 0.3-SNAPSHOT (was 0.4-SNAPSHOT).
Added compiler plugin configuration to set the encoding of Java source files to iso8859-1 (otherwise some of the tests may fail).
Added compiler plugin configuration to use Java 1.4 as the source file version.
Added compiler plugin configuration to generate class files compatible with 1.4 compliant JVMs.

author: cutting
msg: HADOOP-461.  Make Java 1.5 an explicit requirement.

author: mbenson
msg: ws
